title: Mini-Ep 203: Fun In the Sun(screen)
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 203: Fun In the Sun(screen)
itunes:subtitle: Kate celebrates visiting friends and family and wonders why she’s not a Seattalite and Doree does a Disneyland day! Then, they suggest a listener get a sun hat the size of a skating rink, remind a listener why Caroline Hirons doesn’t want you to wash y...
description:
Kate celebrates visiting friends and family and wonders why she’s not a Seattalite and Doree does a Disneyland day! Then, they suggest a listener get a sun hat the size of a skating rink, remind a listener why Caroline Hirons doesn’t want you to wash your face in the shower, and get poison-ivy level irritated about a listener’s bad Mother’s Day experience.  


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 

Join us on June 7 for a live virtual happy hour! To attend, pre-order Doree's book Thanks for Waiting and register at doree-shafrir.com/pre-order.

Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter.


This episode is sponsored by:
